comments.body:
This should include the class comments from the original interface as well (updated for recent changes): ``` /** * A mix-in interface for {@link DataSourceV2} delete support. Data sources can implement this * interface to provide the ability to delete data from tables that matches filter expressions. *

* Data sources must implement this interface to support logical operations that combine writing * data with deleting data, like overwriting partitions. */ ```

comments.body: Is it still valid? We already have `SupportsOverwrite` for overwriting data. And `SupportsDelete` is different from `SupportsOverwrite`, because it doesn't create `WriteBuilder`.

comments.body: No, this isn't valid any longer and should be updated.

comments.body: Thanks for pointing it out. I removed the second paragraph since the first paragraph states clearly for this simple case.
